net.sourceforge.jasa.market
Interface Market

All Superinterfaces:
QuoteProvider, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable
All Known Implementing Classes:
MarketSimulation
public interface Market
extends QuoteProvider, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable

An order-driven market exchange.
